name: Borderline (Extra Jos)
description:
Left click on a dot, then drag it to another dot to make a line. To take back a line, simply right click on the line you want to remove. You may only have five lines in play at any time.

When you create a line while a spider is in the path, you get a point! (The spider also gets ripped in half. Don't worry though, it's made of paper.)

Don't let the spiders get to the lollipop at the bottom!

Due to some issues with the resolution and scaling and what not, I recommend playing in full screen, if you are playing on a browser.
